title: Provide Input for Text Capture
content:
The input files must confirm to this format.

If you don't have files in that format, Create Input Files.

If you have files in that format on your local computer, Upload Input Files.

If you have files generated by Text Capture on ETC site, Select an Existing Folder.

title: Create Input Files
content:
If you don't have input files, select Create Input Files option.

1. Create a new folder or select an existing folder.
2. Click on Create Files button. Then Select either Single File Creation or Batch Creation, and follow instructions on screen

title: Upload Input Files
content:
If you have files in the required format on your local computer, select Upload Input Files option.

1. Create a new folder or select an existing folder.
2. Click on Upload Input Files button.

title: Select an Existing Folder
content:
If you have files in the required format on ETC site, select Select Existing Folder option.

Click on Select Folder button to select an existing folder.
